name: Weekend Fire Marathon
description:
IMPORTANT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I forgot to anchor the text UI properly. In order to play the game normally please set the monitors resulotion to 4K but don't worry if you don't have a 4K monitor, you don't have to. You can still do it if you have a 1080p monitor. Just go to the windows 10 settings.

This is a game where you participate in the Weekend Fire Marathon. Do your best to get to the water and put the fire out in time.
